H0.text: Pinocytosis is another word for cellular drinking.

H1.text: Hypothalamus is another word for cellular drinking.

H2.text: Cellular hydration is another word for cellular drinking.

H3.text: Altostratus is another word for cellular drinking.

A4.text: The word pinocytosis () uses combining forms of pino- + cyto- + -osis, all Neo-Latin from Greek, reflecting p√≠no, to drink, and cytosis.
